revised_title: Investigating the Absorption of Lysins at Cell Interfaces
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to study the absorption of lysins at cell interfaces and their effects on cell membranes. They discovered that the initial absorption of lysins is a constant fraction of the initial quantity present, and the absorption varies with different lysins and cell types. This research helps to understand the mechanisms of lysin action and the role of lysins in cell lysis.
